EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_PG Conf_Silicon Valley_Q415.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at PGConf!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Greenplum-Email-Banner.png> Thank you for visiting Pivotal at PGConf Silicon Valley. We hope you enjoyed learning about the evolving practices and technologies for innovating and transforming business through software.
Recently, Pivotal unveiled the worldâ€™s first massively parallel processing (MPP) data warehouse to open source: Greenplum Database <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415>. Built over the past 10 years, with nearly two million lines of code, Greenplum Database is the last of our core data solutions to be released under the Apache Software 2.0 license.
If you would like to be a part of the Greenplum Database open source community, check out these new resources:
- Greenplum Database site <http://greenplum.org/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415> - Greenplum Database code on GitHub <https://github.com/greenplum-db/gpdb?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415> - Greenplum Database sandbox on GitHub <https://github.com/greenplum-db/gpdb-sandbox-tutorials?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415>
Want more?
- Check out this replay of a recent webinar <https://youtu.be/SxXZBmAs1aE?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415> on How Data Science is Preventing College Dropouts and Advancing Student Success. - View the latest Pivotal Academy <http://pivotal.io/academy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415> schedule and register for one of our courses.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <https://pivotal.io/news-events/#events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PG-Conference-Q415>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
